Elf Uhr fünf, die Blumen blüh'n im Licht,
Ein sanfter Hauch, der Tag verspricht.

Eleven oh five, the day truly thrives,
Nature's dance at eleven past five.

Eleven oh five, the morning alive,
Sunlight dances, bees take a dive.

Eleven after eleven, nature's waltz in motion,
Minutes whisper stories, in time's endless ocean.
